entity.name: Global Citizen: Unite For Our Future
entity.description: No one is safe until everyone is safe. Join Global Citizen, the European Commission, Miley Cyrus, Justin Bieber, and many more to Unite for our Future! Call on world leaders, corporations, and philanthropists to help fund COVID-19 tests, treatments, and vaccines to ensure no one is left behind in this pandemic. #GlobalGoalUnite

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: For Love Choir's cover of Beyoncé's 'Freedom' is everything 🙌 Take action with us to help marginalized people break free from the inequalities and injustices that keep them from accessing quality COVID-19 care: https://t.co/AQFKWGWXjE #GlobalGoalUnite https://t.co/w8NniZlRYe
